name: crypto-shield
description: CryptoShield is a powerful and efficient Node.js library designed for seamless encryption and decryption using a variety of algorithms. Leveraging Node.js's built-in crypto module, this library empowers users with fine-grained control over their encryption processes, ensuring both security and flexibility.
author: nextyfine-dev

scripts.build:cjs: npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && mv dist/cjs/index.js dist/cjs/index.cjs
scripts.build:esm: npx tsc -p tsconfig.json && mv dist/esm/index.js dist/esm/index.mjs
scripts.build:npm: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
